title: Phosphatidylserine | Integrative Therapeutics®
description: Phosphatidylserine is a soy-free phosphatidylserine product. Phosphatidylserine is a critical component of cell membranes, and it is found in especially high concentrations in the brain and nervous tissues, primarily in the cell membranes of neurons.
cleaned_text: [View full details](/products/phosphatidylserine) Product information A CRITICAL COMPONENT OF CELL MEMBRANES Phosphatidylserine (PS) is a naturally occurring phospholipid. Like other phospholipids, PS is a critical component of cell membranes, and it is found in high concentrations in the brain and nervous tissues, primarily in the cell membranes of neurons. Research shows that phosphatidylserine supplementation can: - Promote cognitive function and mental sharpness* - Support a healthy endocrine response to mental stress* - Help improve exercise capacity* Unlike other forms of PS, Integrative Therapeutics's Phosphatidylserine is derived from sunflower oil and is 100% soy-free. While most of the clinical research has utilized either soybean-derived or bovine-sourced phosphatidylserine, PS from sunflower oil is chemically indistinguishable from soy or bovine-sourced oils. This makes it an ideal option for those who wish to avoid soy-based or bovine-derived PS alternatives. A CRITICAL COMPONENT OF CELL MEMBRANES Phosphatidylserine (PS) is a naturally occurring phospholipid. Like other phospholipids, PS is a critical component of cell membranes, and it is found in high concentrations in the brain and nervous tissues, primarily in the cell membranes of neurons. Research shows that phosphatidylserine supplementation can: - Promote cognitive function and mental sharpness* - Support a healthy endocrine response to mental stress* - Help improve exercise capacity* Unlike other forms of PS, Integrative Therapeutics's Phosphatidylserine is derived from sunflower oil and is 100% soy-free. While most of the clinical research has utilized either soybean-derived or bovine-sourced phosphatidylserine, PS from sunflower oil is chemically indistinguishable from soy or bovine-sourced oils. This makes it an ideal option for those who wish to avoid soy-based or bovine-derived PS alternatives. INGREDIENTS 100mg Phosphatidylserine (from sunflower lecithin) ** Daily Value (DV) not established Percent daily value is based on a 2000 calorie diet Other Ingredients Phosphatidylserine Does Not Contain Salt Wheat Gluten Soy Dairy Colors Other Details SharpPS® is a registered trademark of Frutarom. UPC: 871791706576 DIRECTIONS Phosphatidylserine Directions and/or DosageAdults swallow 1 softgel three times daily for one month, then 2 times daily thereafter, or as recommended by a healthcare professional. Do not chew. Best results are obtained with continuous use. WarningIf you are pregnant, nursing, or taking prescription drugs, consult a healthcare professional before use. Keep out of reach of children. Safety sealed with inner seal. Do not use if seal is broken or missing. Keep tightly closed. Store at room temperature. Avoid excessive heat and direct sunlight. INTERACTIONS FAQS A: Caution should be taken whenever recommending, or consuming, nutritional supplements. Use this drug-nutrient interaction checker to view potential interactions with the ingredients of Phosphatidylserine.
